languages.text: "Приступаю к изложению. С благословения Омниссии я провел несколько сеансов техномедитации, облекая потоки данных в матрицу закономерностей. Данные, кои я подверг анализу, есть сведения об отклонениях в работе систем корабля, а также сервиторов, а также нарушения в алгоритмах судового журнала".

traits.locale_text: "Приступаю к изложению. С благословения Омниссии я провел несколько сеансов техномедитации, облекая потоки данных в матрицу закономерностей. Данные, кои я подверг анализу, есть сведения об отклонениях в работе систем корабля, а также сервиторов, а также нарушения в алгоритмах судового журнала".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Initiating exposition. With the Omnissiah's blessing, I conducted several sessions of tech-meditation in an effort to transpose the available data streams into a matrix of patterns. The data subjected to this analysis comprised evidence of deviations in the operation of the ship's systems and servitors as well as irregularities in the algorithms of the ship's log."
languages.original_text: "Приступаю к изложению. С благословения Омниссии я провел несколько сеансов техномедитации, облекая потоки данных в матрицу закономерностей. languages.text: 「説明開始。万機神のご加護のもと、利用可能なデータストリームをパターンの変数に置換しようと、技術瞑想を数回行った。この分析の対象となるデータは船のシステムのオペレーションにおける逸脱、サーヴィター、および船が記録したアルゴリズムの不規則性の証拠を含む」
languages.original_text: "Initiating exposition. With the Omnissiah's blessing, I conducted several sessions of tech-meditation in an effort to transpose the available data streams into a matrix of patterns. The data subjected to this analysis comprised evidence of deviations in the operation of the ship's systems and servitors as well as irregularities in the algorithms of the ship's log."

traits.locale_text: 「説明開始。万機神のご加護のもと、利用可能なデータストリームをパターンの変数に置換しようと、技術瞑想を数回行った。この分析の対象となるデータは船のシステムのオペレーションにおける逸脱、サーヴィター、および船が記録したアルゴリズムの不規則性の証拠を含む」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “开始阐述。在欧姆尼塞亚的祝福下，我进行了几次技术冥想，试图将可用的数据流转换成模式矩阵。此次分析的数据包括舰船系统和机仆运行偏差的证据，以及舰船日志算法中的违规行为。”
languages.original_text: "Initiating exposition. With the Omnissiah's blessing, I conducted several sessions of tech-meditation in an effort to transpose the available data streams into a matrix of patterns. The data subjected to this analysis comprised evidence of deviations in the operation of the ship's systems and servitors as well as irregularities in the algorithms of the ship's log."

traits.locale_text: “开始阐述。在欧姆尼塞亚的祝福下，我进行了几次技术冥想，试图将可用的数据流转换成模式矩阵。此次分析的数据包括舰船系统和奴工运行偏差的证据，以及舰船日志算法中的违规行为。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Initialisiere Exposition. Mit dem Segen des Omnissiah habe ich mehrere Tech-Meditationen durchgeführt, um die verfügbaren Datenströme in eine Mustermatrix zu übertragen. Die Daten, die dieser Analyse unterzogen wurden, lieferten Hinweise auf Abweichungen im Betrieb der Schiffssysteme und der Servitoren sowie auf Unregelmäßigkeiten in den Algorithmen des Logs."
languages.original_text: "Initiating exposition. With the Omnissiah's blessing, I conducted several sessions of tech-meditation in an effort to transpose the available data streams into a matrix of patterns. The data subjected to this analysis comprised evidence of deviations in the operation of the ship's systems and servitors as well as irregularities in the algorithms of the ship's log."

traits.locale_text: "Initialisiere Exposition. Mit dem Segen des Omnissiah habe ich mehrere Tech-Meditationen durchgeführt, um die verfügbaren Datenströme in eine Mustermatrix zu übertragen. Die Daten, die dieser Analyse unterzogen wurden, lieferten Hinweise auf Abweichungen im Betrieb der Schiffssysteme und der Servitoren sowie auf Unregelmäßigkeiten in den Algorithmen des Logs."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Initialisation de l'exposé. Avec la bénédiction de l'Omnimessie, j'ai procédé à plusieurs séances de technoméditation afin de transposer les flux de données disponibles en une matrice de modèles. Les données soumises à cette analyse comprenaient des éléments indiquant des anomalies dans le fonctionnement des systèmes et des servitors du vaisseau, ainsi que des irrégularités dans les algorithmes du journal de bord. »
languages.original_text: "Initiating exposition. With the Omnissiah's blessing, I conducted several sessions of tech-meditation in an effort to transpose the available data streams into a matrix of patterns. The data subjected to this analysis comprised evidence of deviations in the operation of the ship's systems and servitors as well as irregularities in the algorithms of the ship's log."

traits.locale_text: « Initialisation de l'exposé. Avec la bénédiction de l'Omnimessie, j'ai procédé à plusieurs séances de technoméditation afin de transposer les flux de données disponibles en une matrice de modèles. Les données soumises à cette analyse comprenaient des éléments indiquant des anomalies dans le fonctionnement des systèmes et des servitors du vaisseau, ainsi que des irrégularités dans les algorithmes du journal de bord. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Iniciando declaración. Con la bendición del Omnissiah, llevé a cabo diversas sesiones de tecnomeditación en un esfuerzo por transponer los flujos de datos disponibles en una matriz de patrones. Los datos sometidos a este análisis muestran evidencias de desviaciones en la operación de los sistemas de la nave y de sus servidores, así como irregularidades en los algoritmos del cuaderno de bitácora».
languages.original_text: "Initiating exposition. With the Omnissiah's blessing, I conducted several sessions of tech-meditation in an effort to transpose the available data streams into a matrix of patterns. The data subjected to this analysis comprised evidence of deviations in the operation of the ship's systems and servitors as well as irregularities in the algorithms of the ship's log."

traits.locale_text: «Iniciando declaración. Con la bendición del Omnissiah, llevé a cabo diversas sesiones de tecnomeditación en un esfuerzo por transponer los flujos de datos disponibles en una matriz de patrones. Los datos sometidos a este análisis muestran evidencias de desviaciones en la operación de los sistemas de la nave y de sus servidores, así como irregularidades en los algoritmos del cuaderno de bitácora».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "İzahat başlatılıyor. Hermesih'in lütfuyla, mevcut veri akışlarını model matrislerine dönüştürme gayesiyle birkaç tekno meditasyon seansı düzenledim. Analize tabi tutulan veriler, gemi sistemlerinin ve hizmetörlerin faaliyetlerinde yaşanan sapmaların yanı sıra gemi kayıtlarının algoritmasındaki aykırılıklara dair kanıtlar barındırıyordu."
languages.original_text: "Initiating exposition. With the Omnissiah's blessing, I conducted several sessions of tech-meditation in an effort to transpose the available data streams into a matrix of patterns. The data subjected to this analysis comprised evidence of deviations in the operation of the ship's systems and servitors as well as irregularities in the algorithms of the ship's log."

traits.locale_text: "İzahat başlatılıyor. Hermesih'in lütfuyla, mevcut veri akışlarını model matrislerine dönüştürme gayesiyle birkaç tekno meditasyon seansı düzenledim. Analize tabi tutulan veriler, gemi sistemlerinin ve hizmetörlerin faaliyetlerinde yaşanan sapmaların yanı sıra gemi kayıtlarının algoritmasındaki aykırılıklara dair kanıtlar barındırıyordu."
